column4: Q: I'm having difficulty connecting to any named internet resource... I can ping them with responses, however unable to open them in browser, any thoughts?
for testing (assuming you're using firefox) "cd ~ && mv .mozilla .mozilla_BACKUP" then try firefox again
no go, still have errors connecting to www.ubuntu.com
I ran updates today which did a partial update.
if you haven't already you'll want to undo my testing change "cd ~ && mv .mozilla_BACKUP .mozilla"
i switch the above command from BACKUP to regular
it's like pages start to load, but then the connection times out.
I know the internet works as i'm on the same connection to send these msgs
i'm affraid i really don't know what could be causing that???  hopefully someone else will have some insights!
have you tried with a different browser?
but I have the same issue when trying to connet to an RDC server
